document.full_text: a senior pakistani intelligence official said one of osama bin laden's daughters had seen her father being shot dead by u.s. forces, and was one of about 10 relatives of the al qaeda leader in custody pending interrogation.
document.title: pakistan has bin laden wife, children in custody
lines_and_colors: a senior pakistani intelligence official said one of osama bin laden's daughters had seen her father being shot dead by u.s. forces, and was one of about 10 relatives of the al qaeda leader in custody pending interrogation.
